td.content: s:pt presents w/ c/o 5 weeks h/o Heart. she is a F student aged 23 ys. o:Height 177 cm, Weight 71.9 kg, Temperature 37 C, Pulse 89, SystolicBP 112, DiastolicBP 74, Respiration 18 a:Mitral Valve Prolapse p:performed E/M Level 2 (new patient) - Completed, and prescribed metoprolol - 50 mg daily, and ordered 2D echocardiogram panel.

s:female student aged 24 ys presents with Heart for 11 days. she has a history of Mitral Valve Prolapse for past 4 years. ocas ETOH on w/e she states she has never smoked a cigarette in her life o:Height 177 cm, Weight 72.3 kg, Temperature 36.7 C, Pulse 85, SystolicBP 117, DiastolicBP 77, Respiration 17 a:Mitral Valve Prolapse p:performed E/M Level 3 (established patient) - Completed, and prescribed metoprolol - 50 mg daily, and ordered 2D echocardiogram panel.
